reviewText: George and his wife are amazing. Loved the show. I feel like painting now. Easy to follow and watch. Great for the family.

This is an interesting documentary about a local painter that goes by the nickname "King Ghici" in San Antonio, Texas. He'll show you how much music has influenced a lot his paintings over the years & how people are inspired by his paintings.
What an amazing and fun documentary of one inspiring artist! I would def watch this again! Highly recommended.
